scripts.allure:report:open: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report & allure open
scripts.allure:clear: if exist allure-results rmdir /q /s allure-results && if exist allure-report rmdir /q /s allure-report && if exist cypress\screenshots rmdir /q /s cypress\screenshots && if exist cypress\videos rmdir /q /s cypress\videos
scripts.run:test:allure-report:generate:open: npm run cy:run:allure & npm run allure:report:open
scripts.convertOpenHtml: node convertOpenHtml.js results && npm run openHtml
